message: Let's start fair, I propose a 60/40 split. You get a good chunk, and we can both walk away with something.
I think we can do better than 60/40.  Let's try a more even split.  I'll take 55, and you can have 45.
Let's split it evenly this time, Bob.  We're both losing money with each round, and this way we can both maximize our gains.
